overview: A quirky little film about relationships and loneliness, with a dose of humor and pathos, When Sally Met Rascal... is about an outcast homeless woman, Sally, who the world has turned a blind eye from, save for a fellow outcast homeless dog. Slightly crazy but more likely wise, the cynical homeless prophet initially rejects the good-natured dog, but eventually gives in, forming a bond sealed by her naming her one and only friend, Rascal. At a low point in her life, Sally gains renewed hope through unconditional love for Rascal.
title: When Sally Met Rascal...
